faq.question1: How close are you to Arenal Volcano?
faq.answer1: We are just a 10-minute drive from the entrance to Arenal Volcano National Park and less than 5 minutes from downtown La Fortuna. You’ll enjoy stunning views of the volcano right from the property!
faq.answer2: Yes, we offer free private parking on-site for all guests. The area is secure and easily accessible for all vehicle types.
faq.question3: Are local tours and activities available?
faq.answer3: Absolutely! We can help you book popular activities like hot springs, ziplining, waterfall hikes, volcano tours, and more. Ask us for recommendations — we love helping guests plan their adventures!
